properties.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 5 at 3:26AM EST until February 6 at 6:00AM EST by NWS Baltimore MD/Washington DC
properties.description:
* WHAT...Freezing rain expected. Total ice accumulations around
one to two tenths of an inch.

* WHERE...In Maryland, Extreme Western Allegany County. In West
Virginia, Western Mineral County.

* WHEN...From 6 PM this evening to 6 AM EST Thursday.

* IMPACTS...Difficult travel conditions are possible. The
hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening
commute.

* ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Confidence for ice accretions is highest
on elevated surfaces such as bridges and overpasses.
properties.instruction:
Slow down and use caution while traveling. Prepare for possible
power outages.

When venturing outside, watch your first few steps taken on
steps, sidewalks, and driveways, which could be icy and slippery,
increasing your risk of a fall and injury.

NWSheadline: WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 6 PM THIS EVENING TO 6 AM EST THURSDAY
